channel.title: Need Help <3
channel.description:
I AM USING A 317 [PI]
How can i add a ::bank command? How can i add a donator pin (when you click it you get donator) How can i fix the bank at the top it says "Bank Of Runescape" How can i fix passwords in the character files there all random numbers How can i add a [$] for donators when you click on there name the sign is beside there name?

item.title: Need Help <3
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

[quote=“Dylan123321, post:1, topic:507696”]I AM USING A 317 [PI]

How can i fix passwords in the character files there all random numbers[/quote]

I suggest u leave the password files alone, if someone hacks into the source he can steal the passwords, if u keep it like that there is a less chance of that happening. Also i suggest that u don’t ask the community to spoonfeed you all the answers.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help <3
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Sup22211:

c.openBank(); or something.

Don’t post methods unless you are sure that they are the correct ones.
Dylan, all I see here is you asking us to spoon feed you tidbits of code that you won’t understand and will find a way to get compile errors from. I’ve seen quite a few of your questions asked by other people and answered, so I suggest you go take a look there, as well as start studying up on Java.

Read full topic
